attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel it is time to punish those who are in the early stages of committing crimes. Including anti social behaviour. Looking at how people are not put off by cautions and ASBO's.
It would be far better to introduce a Boot Camp system and when completed this would not give the offender a criminal record just a mark to allow the police to know he/she had attended a camp. Depending on the severity it could be a two to four week camp. And it must be completed within 4 weeks of committing the offence. The system is far to slow to punish offenders and because of this they re offend prior to attending court.

rejection.details: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to 'First Time Offenders' does not make any sense - it should request an action
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
